definitions.title: vb. denom. Haph.
definitions.body: make proclamation (poss. directly dependent on khru/c (D:§ 37, p. 146 (2nd ed. 183) K:l. c. M:67*), but even then formed as denom.; cf. Targum [[כְּרַו]], NH [[כָּרַז]], Syr. kr0 Af. Ethpe., so Chr-Pal. Schwally:Idiot. 46 Schulth:Lex. 97);—Pf. 3 mpl. [[הַכְּ רִ֫חוּ]] Da 5:29, c. [[עַיל]] pers. concerning.
